text:
="preserve">Walter Pérez Villamonte (3 November 1936 – 29 March 2018) was a Bolivian Roman Catholic bishop.
Pérez Villamonte was ordained to the priesthood in 1962. He served as titular bishop of "Churbis" and as auxiliary bishop of the Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Sucre, Bolivia, from 1995 to 1998. He then served as bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Potosí, Bolivia, from 1998 to 2009.
Pérez Villamonte died on 29 March 2018 at the age of 81.
